DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Required : TMP / SMX , aerosolize pentamidine , dapsone PCP prophylaxis . Allowed : Atovaquone . IV pentamidine . TMP / SMX . Trimetrexate . Trimethoprimdapsone . Clindamycinprimaquine . Topical antifungal . Clotrimazole . Ketoconazole . Fluconazole . Amphotericin B. Itraconazole . Rifabutin . Isoniazid . Pyrazinamide . Clofazimine . Clarithromycin . Azithromycin . Ethambutol . Amikacin . Ciprofloxacin . Ofloxacin . Pyrimethamine . Sulfadiazine . Clindamycin . Filgrastim ( GCSF ) . Up 1000 mg/day acyclovir . Erythropoietin . Antibiotics . Antipyretics . Analgesics . Antiemetics . Rifampin . Concurrent Treatment : Allowed : Local radiation therapy . Patients must : HIV infection . CD4 count 300 600 cells/mm3 . NO history AIDS . NO active opportunistic infection . NO prior nucleoside therapy . Life expectancy least 2 year . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Serious underlie medical condition HIV life expectancy le 2 year . Malignancy require systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy . Active grade 2 bad peripheral neuropathy . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Antiretrovirals study drug . Systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy . Foscarnet . Patients follow prior condition exclude : Chronic diarrhea define three stool per day 15 day , within 30 day prior study entry . Unexplained temperature > = 38.5 C 7 day within 30 day prior study entry . Active participation experimental therapy within 30 day prior study entry . Prior Medication : Excluded : Prior nucleoside antiretrovirals 1 week long duration . Any antiretroviral within 90 day prior study entry .
